remarks: Statement following from existence and generalization with equality. (Contributed by AV, 9-Feb-2019.)
statement:
rexraleqim.1 $e |- ( x = z -> ( ps <-> ph ) ) $.
rexraleqim.2 $e |- ( z = Y -> ( ph <-> th ) ) $.
rexraleqim $p |- ( ( E. z e. A ph /\ A. x e. A ( ps -> x = Y ) ) -> th ) $.
$d A x z $.
$d Y x z $.
$d ph x $.
$d ps z $.
$d th z $.
